aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-1323-113 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 19/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 21/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 22/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 26/01/2025 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 27/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

b) Defect Observed: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
